<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>In Madrid, we have introduced rights_consumed on samp_license_metric_result. It will be rights used + rights needed. We will only upgrade license metric result tied to the latest product result.</description>
        <name>Set rights consumed on LMR</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function getRightsNeeded(licenseMetricResultGr) {
	var rightsNeeded = 0;
	var unusedRights = 0;

	var remediationOptionGr = new GlideRecord('samp_remediation_option');
	remediationOptionGr.addQuery('software_model_result', licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('software_model_result'));
	remediationOptionGr.addQuery('license_metric', licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('license_metric'));

	if (remediationOptionGr.isValidField('oracle_option')) {
		remediationOptionGr.addQuery('oracle_option', licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('oracle_option'));
	}
	remediationOptionGr.addQuery('remediation_action', 'purchase_rights');
	remediationOptionGr.query();

	if (remediationOptionGr.next()) {
		rightsNeeded = gs.nil(remediationOptionGr.getValue('rights_needed'))
			? 0
			: parseInt(remediationOptionGr.getValue('rights_needed'), 10);
		unusedRights = gs.nil(licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('unused_rights'))
			? 0
			: parseInt(licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('unused_rights'), 10);
	}

	return rightsNeeded + unusedRights;
}

function setRightsConsumedOnLMR() {
	var licenseMetricResultGr = new GlideRecord('samp_license_metric_result');
	licenseMetricResultGr.addQuery('software_model_result.latest', true);
	licenseMetricResultGr.query();

	while (licenseMetricResultGr.next()) {
		var rightsUsed = gs.nil(licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('rights_used'))
			? 0
			: parseInt(licenseMetricResultGr.getValue('rights_used'), 10);
		var rightsNeeded = getRightsNeeded(licenseMetricResultGr);
		var rightsConsumed = rightsUsed + rightsNeeded;

		licenseMetricResultGr.setValue('rights_consumed', rightsConsumed);
		licenseMetricResultGr.setWorkflow(false);
		licenseMetricResultGr.update();
	}
}

setRightsConsumedOnLMR();]]></script>
